sample_options.name: Sample options
sample_options.description: Parameters relating to the sample being analysed.

smallrna_fasta.name: small RNA FASTA
smallrna_fasta.description: FASTA file to be mapped to before the genome file, containing rRNA, tRNA sequences, snRNAs and other contaminant sequences.

star_index.name: Genome STAR index
star_index.description: A genome index generated by STAR.

bowtie2_index.name: Small RNA Bowtie index
bowtie2_index.description: A small RNA index for pre-mapping generated by Bowtie2.

skip_umi_extract.name: Skip UMI Extraction
skip_umi_extract.description: Skip the UMI extraction from the read in case the UMIs have been moved to the headers in advance of the pipeline run.

umi_extract_method.name: Type of UMI pattern
umi_extract_method.description: UMI pattern to use. Can be either 'string' (default) or 'regex'.

umi_pattern.name: UMI Tools barcode pattern
umi_pattern.description: The UMI barcode pattern to use if the UMI is on read 1 e.g. 'NNNNNN' indicates that the first 6 nucleotides of the read are from the UMI.

umi_separator.name: UMI Tools barcode separator
umi_separator.description: The UMI barcode separator in read name to use for UMI-based deduplication

read_preprocessing_options.name: Read Preprocessing Settings
read_preprocessing_options.description: Settings to control read quality, adaptor trimming and filtering reads of a minimum length

skip_preprocessing.name: Skip trimming and length-filtering
skip_preprocessing.description: Skip the adapter trimming step and read length filtering step.

min_quality.name: Minimum score for quality trimming
min_quality.description: Cutoff value for Cutadapt trimming low-quality ends from reads

times_trimmed.name: Times trimmed
times_trimmed.description: Number of times a read will be adaptor trimmed

ts_trimming.name: Template-switch protcol trimming
ts_trimming.description: Convenience option to enable trimming of poly-A from the 3'end of reads, and the first 3 nucleotides corresponding to rGrGrG for Template-switch libraries. If using this option, there is no need to specify the 5' and 3' adaptor sequences.

ts_adapter_threeprime.name: Template-switch protcol 3'end trimming
ts_adapter_threeprime.description: Sequence to be trimmed from the 3'end of reads for Template-switch libraries. Applicable when ts_trimming is enabled (true).

trim_polyG.name: Template-switch protcol 5'end trimming
trim_polyG.description: Trim the first 3 nucleotides from the 5' end corresponding to rGrGrG for Template-switch libraries. Applicable when ts_trimming is enabled (true).

premapping_options.name: Pre-mapping Settings
premapping_options.description: Settings to control pre-mapping to the smRNA FASTA.

skip_premap.name: Skip pre-mapping
skip_premap.description: Skip pre-mapping to the smRNA FASTA, typically containing rRNA and tRNA sequences.

bowtie2_args.name: Pre-mapping aligner
bowtie2_args.description: Specifies the command line options for bowtie2.

qc_options.name: Ribo-seq Quality Control Settings
qc_options.description: Settings to control generation of quality control files.

skip_qc.name: Skip quality control
skip_qc.description: Skip generation of quality control files.

expected_length.name: Expected read lengths range
expected_length.description: Expected read lengths range for quality control plots, using the pattern: minimum:maximum.

gene_quantification_options.name: Gene-level Quantification Settings
gene_quantification_options.description: Settings to control gene-level quantifcation from genome-aligned reads.

strandedness.name: Library strandedness
strandedness.description: Library strandedness for FeatureCounts gene-level quantification. Options are forward, reverse or unstranded.

psite_options.name: P-site Identification Settings
psite_options.description: Settings to control P-site identification, quantification and diagnostics

skip_psite.name: Skip P-site identification and quantification
skip_psite.description: Skip P-site identification and generation of riboWaltz diagnotics plots

length_range.name: Read lengths range used for P-site identification
length_range.description: Read lengths range used for P-site identification, using the pattern: minimum:maximum.

psite_method.name: P-site identification method using riboWaltz
psite_method.description: Specifies method used for P-site offsets identification. Options are ribowaltz (default) or global_max_5end). For ribowaltz P-site offsets are defined using riboWaltz default seetings. See https://github.com/LabTranslationalArchitectomics/riboWaltz/ for more details. For global_max_5end P-site offsets are defined by the distances between the first nucleotide of the translation initiation site and the nucleotide corresponding to the global maximum of the read length-specific 5'end profiles.

exclude_start.name: Number of nucleotides 3' from the start codon to be excluded from CDS P-site coverage
exclude_start.description: Specifies the number of nucleotides 3' from the start codon to be excluded from CDS P-site quantification (default 42, i.e. exclude the first 14 codons).

exclude_stop.name: Number of nucleotides 5' from the stop codon to be excluded from CDS P-site coverage
exclude_stop.description: Specifies the number of nucleotides 5' from the stop codon to be excluded from CDS P-site quantification (default 27, i.e. exclude the last 9 codons).

ribocutter_options.name: Design of sgRNA Templates Settings
ribocutter_options.description: Settings for the Design of sgRNA Templates to Deplete Unwanted Abundant Contaminants.

skip_ribocutter.name: Skip Design of sgRNA Templates
skip_ribocutter.description: Skip Design of sgRNA Templates using Ribocutter. See https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.07.14.451473v1.full for more details.

guide_number.name: Number of guides
guide_number.description: Number of guides to be designed by Ribocutter for the depletion of unwanted abundant contaminants.

max_reads.name: Maximum number of reads to be used for guide design
max_reads.description: Maximum number of reads to be used by Ribocutter for designing guides for the depletion of unwanted abundant contaminants.

min_read_length.name: Minimum length for reads to be used for guide design
min_read_length.description: Minimum Read Length for Ribocutter to design guides for the depletion of unwanted abundant contaminants. By default, all read lengths are considered, and additionally Ribocutter is also run on reads longer or equal to 23.

coverage_tracks_options.name: Coverage Tracks Settings
coverage_tracks_options.description: Settings for Generating Track Files for Genome Browser Viewing.

bin_size.name: Number of nucleotides specifying bin size
bin_size.description: Size of the bins, in bases, for the output of the bigwig/bedgraph file.

track_format.name: Format of the coverage tracks
track_format.description: Output coverage tracks file type. Either bigwig or bedgraph.

cli_options.name: Command Line Options
cli_options.description: Provide customised command line options to specific processes.

ribocutter_args.name: Additional Ribocutter parameters
ribocutter_args.description: Additional parameters for guide design with Ribocutter. See https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.07.14.451473v1.full for more details.

outputs.name: Genome and transcriptomic alignment bam
outputs.description: Genome and transcriptomic alignments in bam format for downstream analyses and genome browser viewing.

outputs.name: Gene-level counts
outputs.description: Gene count table in tsv format.

outputs.name: Coverage tracks
outputs.description: Coverage tracks in bigWig or bedGraph format.

outputs.name: Coverage tracks
outputs.description: Coverage tracks in bigWig or bedGraph format.

outputs.name: P-sites CDS coverage
outputs.description: P-site count table for CDS, for all samples. (Note: coverage for the CDS windows excluding specified regions downstream start and upstream stop codons are also available.)

outputs.name: P-sites codon coverage
outputs.description: P-site codon coverage, for all samples.

outputs.name: Rbosome footprints codon coverage
outputs.description: Rbosome footprints codon coverage, for all samples.

outputs.name: P-site offsets
outputs.description: P-site offsets for each analysed read length, for all samples.

outputs.name: P-site information
outputs.description: Per-sample TSV file with P-site information for each read.

outputs.name: Riboseq QC
outputs.description: Riboseq QC metrics extracted from FASTQ and alignment files. Per-sample and summary PDF files with graphs showing the number of reads, proprtions of pre-mapping and uniquely mapping reads to the genome, coverage of read extremities around start and stop codons, frame, stratified by length, as well as duplication and fraction of reads uniquely mapping to the longest CDS isoform for each gene.

outputs.name: PCA
outputs.description: PCA plots from gene-level counts, P-site CDS counts and P-site counts over CDS windows excluding specified regions downstream start and upstream stop codons.

outputs.name: Ribocutter guides
outputs.description: Table in csv format containing guides designed for the depletion of abundant unwanted contaminants. See https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.07.14.451473v1.full for more details. (Note: guides designed using reads of minimim 23 length are also available.)

outputs.name: Proportion of library targeted by the ribocutter guides
outputs.description: Plot showing the fraction of the library targeted by the ribocutter guides.

outputs.name: Quality control report
outputs.description: MultiQC report of read and alignment quality control metrics.
